column5: hey guys go out in the shack for the first time of the year today in the mourning it was hit after hit after hit Many fish were lost today so we got out at 8 and in about 20 minutes my buddy hooked into the first and only walleye of the day a VERY healthy female  on the ice she went he then got this little snot rocket from the same hole on the same jig in about 30 minutes  after that we missed about 5 more tip ups and i finally got a fish....a tiney perch  and he procided to catch more pike   and the last fish of the day i finally landed a fish over a pound  awsome day out there today hope you enjoyed
